titles.title: Direct Hire to Fight Fires Act of 2023
Direct Hire to Fight Fires Act of 2023

A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide direct hire authority to appoint individuals to Federal wildland firefighting and firefighting support positions in the Forest Service and the Department of the Interior, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
